summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE STEERING WHEEL WOULD SHIMMY AS IF A WHEEL WAS OUT OF ALIGNMENT.  THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKED UP AND WAS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO TURN.  I PULL OFF INTO A SERVICE ROAD AND TURNED THE CAR OFF.  I STARTED THE CAR BACK UP AFTER ABOUT 5 MINUTES AND I WAS ABLE TO STEER AGAIN.  IT HAPPENS REPEATEDLY WHEN AFTER THE CAR HAS BEEN PARKED AND I START THE CAR UP, THE STEERING FREEZES.  I'LL RESTART THE CAR 3 OR 4 TIMES BEFORE THE STEERING UNFREEZES.  *TR
